name: mini-cast
title: mini-cast
description: groups raycast commands into custom contexts for less overwhelming use
author: uzair_ghori

commands.name: groups
commands.title: groups
commands.subtitle: shows all groups
commands.description: allows the user to pick from all the groups. then use any command in the selected group normally.

commands.name: select-context
commands.title: select context
commands.subtitle: pick context
commands.description: allows the user to set the context of their current workflow

commands.name: show-context-commands
commands.title: show context commands
commands.subtitle: shows the commands of the current context/group
commands.description: allows the user to only pick raycast commands from the selected context

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
